mapper.select: SELECT id, access_token, refresh_token, expires_at, account_type, ig_business_id, created_at, user_id FROM sns_token WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_token (access_token, refresh_token, expires_at, account_type, ig_business_id, created_at, user_id) VALUES (#{accessToken}, #{refreshToken}, #{expiresAt}, #{accountType}, #{igBusinessId}, #{createdAt}, #{userId})
